<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a &#39;end&#95;try&#95;table&#39; instruction in the EndTryTable BB created above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;EndTryTable = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(EndTryTableBB, RangeEnd-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#abb10ef030fba4ea901518a0c8dbef3e2">getDebugLoc</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(WebAssembly::END&#95;TRY&#95;TABLE));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  registerTryScope(TryTable, EndTryTable, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the standard (exnref) EH, we fix unwind mismatches by adding a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block~end&#95;block inside of the unwind destination try&#95;table~end&#95;try&#95;table:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try&#95;table ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block exnref                   ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref N)  ;; (new) to trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;try&#95;table                ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block                      ;; (new) trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   throw&#95;ref                      ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To do this, we will create a new BB that will contain the new &#39;end&#95;block&#39; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;throw&#95;ref&#39; and insert it before the &#39;end&#95;try&#95;table&#39; BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But there are cases when there are &#39;end&#95;loop&#39;(s) before the &#39;end&#95;try&#95;table&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the same BB. (There can&#39;t be &#39;end&#95;block&#39; before &#39;end&#95;try&#95;table&#39; in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same BB because EH pads can&#39;t be directly branched to.) Then after fixing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unwind mismatches this will create the mismatching markers like below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block exnref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new&#95;bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try&#95;table&#95;bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So if an end&#95;try&#95;table BB has an end&#95;loop before the end&#95;try&#95;table, we split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the BB with the end&#95;loop as a separate BB before the end&#95;try&#95;table BB, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that after we fix the unwind mismatch, the code will be like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block exnref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;loop&#95;bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new&#95;bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try&#95;table&#95;bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556" lineLink="#a3f8efd734c37d01f22580c2211a68483"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a3f8efd734c37d01f22580c2211a68483">splitEndLoopBB</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;EndTryTableBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MF = &#42;EndTryTableBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;EndTryTable = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;EndLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(&#42;EndTryTableBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == WebAssembly::END&#95;TRY&#95;TABLE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EndTryTable = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EndTryTable &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == WebAssembly::END&#95;LOOP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EndLoop = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EndLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;EndLoopBB = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#adfc62ee16549afaac5bde30156ddc989">CreateMachineBasicBlock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af4c0db6d503e0ba3b8e44067023ffbba">insert</a>(EndTryTableBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>(), EndLoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SplitPos = std::next(EndLoop-&gt;getIterator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EndLoopBB-&gt;splice(EndLoopBB-&gt;end(), EndTryTableBB, EndTryTableBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    SplitPos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EndLoopBB-&gt;addSuccessor(EndTryTableBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WebAssemblyCFGStackify::fixCallUnwindMismatches(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function is used for both the legacy EH and the standard (exnref) EH,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the reason we have unwind mismatches is the same for the both of them,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but the code examples in the comments are going to be different. To make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the description less confusing, we write the basically same comments twice,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// once for the legacy EH and the standard EH.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Legacy EH --------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Linearizing the control flow by placing TRY / END&#95;TRY markers can create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mismatches in unwind destinations for throwing instructions, such as calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use the &#39;delegate&#39; instruction to fix the unwind mismatches. &#39;delegate&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction delegates an exception to an outer &#39;catch&#39;. It can target not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only &#39;catch&#39; but all block-like structures including another &#39;delegate&#39;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but with slightly different semantics than branches. When it targets a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;catch&#39;, it will delegate the exception to that catch. It is being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discussed how to define the semantics when &#39;delegate&#39;&#39;s target is a non-try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block: it will either be a validation failure or it will target the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer try-catch. But anyway our LLVM backend currently does not generate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such code. The example below illustrates where the &#39;delegate&#39; instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the middle will delegate the exception to, depending on the value of N.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         delegate N    ;; Where will this delegate to?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       catch           ;; N == 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end               ;; N == 1 (invalid; will not be generated)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   delegate            ;; N == 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch                 ;; N == 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       ;; N == 4 (to caller)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 When an instruction may throw, but the EH pad it will unwind to can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    different from the original CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example: we have the following CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo    ; if it throws, unwind to bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @bar    ; if it throws, unwind to bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2 (ehpad):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb3 (ehpad)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And the CFG is sorted in this order. Then after placing TRY markers, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will look like: (BB markers are omitted)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @bar   ;; if it throws, unwind to bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch         ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch           ;; ehpad (bb3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now if bar() throws, it is going to end up in bb2, not bb3, where it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supposed to end up. We solve this problem by wrapping the mismatching call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with an inner try-delegate that rethrows the exception to the right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;catch&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try               ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       call @bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     delegate 1 (bb3)  ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch               ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch                 ;; ehpad (bb3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 The same as 1, but in this case an instruction unwinds to a caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    function and not another EH pad.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example: we have the following CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo       ; if it throws, unwind to bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @bar       ; if it throws, unwind to caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2 (ehpad):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And the CFG is sorted in this order. Then after placing TRY markers, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @bar     ;; if it throws, unwind to caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch           ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now if bar() throws, it is going to end up in bb2, when it is supposed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throw up to the caller. We solve this problem in the same way, but in this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case &#39;delegate&#39;s immediate argument is the number of block depths + 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which means it rethrows to the caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try                  ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   delegate 1 (caller)  ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch                  ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before rewriteDepthImmediates, delegate&#39;s argument is a BB. In case of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caller, it will take a fake BB generated by getFakeCallerBlock(), which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be converted to a correct immediate argument later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In case there are multiple calls in a BB that may throw to the caller, they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be wrapped together in one nested try-delegate scope. (In 1, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// couldn&#39;t happen, because may-throwing instruction there had an unwind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination, i.e., it was an invoke before, and there could be only one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invoke within a BB.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Standard EH ------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Linearizing the control flow by placing TRY / END&#95;TRY&#95;TABLE markers can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create mismatches in unwind destinations for throwing instructions, such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use the a nested &#39;try&#95;table&#39;~&#39;end&#95;try&#95;table&#39; instruction to fix the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unwind mismatches. try&#95;table&#39;s catch clauses take an immediate argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that specifics which block we should branch to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 When an instruction may throw, but the EH pad it will unwind to can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    different from the original CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example: we have the following CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo    ; if it throws, unwind to bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @bar    ; if it throws, unwind to bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2 (ehpad):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb3 (ehpad)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And the CFG is sorted in this order. Then after placing TRY&#95;TABLE markers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (and BLOCK markers for the TRY&#95;TABLE&#39;s destinations), it will look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (BB markers are omitted)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         call @bar              ;; if it throws, unwind to bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;block                  ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block                      ;; ehpad (bb3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now if bar() throws, it is going to end up in bb2, not bb3, where it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supposed to end up. We solve this problem by wrapping the mismatching call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with an inner try&#95;table~end&#95;try&#95;table that sends the exception to the the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;trampoline&#39; block, which rethrows, or &#39;bounces&#39; it to the right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try&#95;table:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     block exnref                       ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 2)  ;; (new) to trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             call @bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           end&#95;try&#95;table                ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end&#95;block                        ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;block                          ;; (new) trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     throw&#95;ref                          ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block                              ;; ehpad (bb3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 The same as 1, but in this case an instruction unwinds to a caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    function and not another EH pad.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example: we have the following CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo       ; if it throws, unwind to bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @bar       ; if it throws, unwind to caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2 (ehpad):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And the CFG is sorted in this order. Then after placing TRY&#95;TABLE markers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (and BLOCK markers for the TRY&#95;TABLE&#39;s destinations), it will look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @bar              ;; if it throws, unwind to caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block                  ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now if bar() throws, it is going to end up in bb2, when it is supposed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throw up to the caller. We solve this problem in the same way, but in this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case &#39;delegate&#39;s immediate argument is the number of block depths + 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which means it rethrows to the caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block exnref                       ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 2)  ;; (new) to trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         call @bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end&#95;try&#95;table                ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block                        ;; ehpad (bb2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block                          ;; (new) caller trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throw&#95;ref                          ;; (new) throw to the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before rewriteDepthImmediates, try&#95;table&#39;s catch clauses&#39; argument is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trampoline BB from which we throw&#95;ref the exception to the right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try&#95;table. In case of the caller, it will take a new caller-dedicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trampoline BB generated by getCallerTrampolineBlock(), which throws the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exception to the caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In case there are multiple calls in a BB that may throw to the caller, they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be wrapped together in one nested try&#95;table-end&#95;try&#95;table scope. (In 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this couldn&#39;t happen, because may-throwing instruction there had an unwind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination, i.e., it was an invoke before, and there could be only one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invoke within a BB.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> EHPadStack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Range of intructions to be wrapped in a new nested try~delegate or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try&#95;table~end&#95;try&#95;table. A range exists in a single BB and does not span</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple BBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">TryRange = std::pair&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, MachineInstr &#42;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In original CFG, &lt;unwind destination BB, a vector of try/try&#95;table ranges&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, SmallVector&lt;TryRange, 4&gt;</a>&gt; UnwindDestToTryRanges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Gather possibly throwing calls (i.e., previously invokes) whose current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unwind destination is not the same as the original CFG. (Case 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(MF)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SeenThrowableInstInBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a16f9d59e0218f930dedb4725b6df7371">WebAssembly::isTry</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EHPadStack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#ad97688dfe9cd802e2a0691cbe620218a">pop&#95;back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a6e775f5df24e1c131a9e1840877503ce">WebAssembly::isCatch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EHPadStack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this loop we only gather calls that have an EH pad to unwind. So</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there will be at most 1 such call (= invoke) in a BB, so after we&#39;ve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// seen one, we can skip the rest of BB. Also if MBB has no EH pad</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// successor or MI does not throw, this is not an invoke.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SeenThrowableInstInBB || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.hasEHPadSuccessor() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#ab6548436b77ac06129373db3d8e3dece">WebAssembly::mayThrow</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SeenThrowableInstInBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the EH pad on the stack top is where this instruction should unwind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// next, we&#39;re good.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;UnwindDest = getFakeCallerBlock(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.successors()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even though semantically a BB can have multiple successors in case an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exception is not caught by a catchpad, in our backend implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is guaranteed that a BB can have at most one EH pad successor. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// details, refer to comments in findWasmUnwindDestinations function in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SelectionDAGBuilder.cpp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ-&gt;isEHPad()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">          UnwindDest = Succ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EHPadStack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>() == UnwindDest)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Include EH&#95;LABELs in the range before and after the invoke</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;RangeBegin = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, &#42;RangeEnd = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RangeBegin-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::prev(RangeBegin-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>())-&gt;isEHLabel())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RangeBegin = &amp;&#42;std::prev(RangeBegin-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::next(RangeEnd-&gt;getIterator()) != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::next(RangeEnd-&gt;getIterator())-&gt;isEHLabel())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RangeEnd = &amp;&#42;std::next(RangeEnd-&gt;getIterator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, record the range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UnwindDestToTryRanges&#91;UnwindDest&#93;.push&#95;back(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><span class="doxyHighlight">          TryRange(RangeBegin, RangeEnd));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;- Call unwind mismatch: MBB = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nCall = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nOriginal dest = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; UnwindDest-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aedf6cb1135961f41f39dc58ca8576123">getName</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Current dest = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; EHPadStack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>()-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(EHPadStack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Gather possibly throwing calls that are supposed to unwind up to the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if they throw, but currently unwind to an incorrect destination. Unlike the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop above, there can be multiple calls within a BB that unwind to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caller, which we should group together in a range. (Case 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;RangeBegin = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;RangeEnd = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inclusive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record the range.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ-&gt;isEHPad()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">            EHPad = Succ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;removeSuccessor(EHPad);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a66b0b93d22f984ea3f11e3fc04dbe744">WebAssembly::WasmUseLegacyEH</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the single destination of try&#95;table, if there is one. All try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we generate in this pass has a single destination, i.e., a single catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014" lineLink="#a61c12dc12b135090e87fcfb959c58f47"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="#a61c12dc12b135090e87fcfb959c58f47">getSingleUnwindDest</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;TryTable) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TryTable-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>() != 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TryTable-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
