<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;try&#95;table: Invalid catch clause\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WebAssemblyCFGStackify::fixCatchUnwindMismatches(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function is used for both the legacy EH and the standard (exnref) EH,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the reason we have unwind mismatches is the same for the both of them,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but the code examples in the comments are going to be different. To make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the description less confusing, we write the basically same comments twice,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// once for the legacy EH and the standard EH.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Legacy EH --------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is another kind of unwind destination mismatches besides call unwind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mismatches, which we will call &quot;catch unwind mismatches&quot;. See this example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after the marker placement:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch &#95;&#95;cpp&#95;exception  ;; ehpad A (next unwind dest: caller)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch&#95;all                ;; ehpad B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2049"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2051"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;call @foo&#39;s unwind destination is the ehpad A. But suppose &#39;call @foo&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2052"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throws a foreign exception that is not caught by ehpad A, and its next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination should be the caller. But after control flow linearization,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another EH pad can be placed in between (e.g. ehpad B here), making the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2055"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// next unwind destination incorrect. In this case, the foreign exception will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead go to ehpad B and will be caught there instead. In this example the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2057"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct next unwind destination is the caller, but it can be another outer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch in other cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no specific &#39;call&#39; or &#39;throw&#39; instruction to wrap with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try-delegate, so we wrap the whole try-catch-end with a try-delegate and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make it rethrow to the right destination, which is the caller in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try                     ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2066"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     catch &#95;&#95;cpp&#95;exception ;; ehpad A (next unwind dest: caller)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2071"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   delegate 1 (caller)     ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch&#95;all                 ;; ehpad B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The right destination may be another EH pad or the caller. (The example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here shows the case it is the caller.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- Standard EH ------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2081"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is another kind of unwind destination mismatches besides call unwind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mismatches, which we will call &quot;catch unwind mismatches&quot;. See this example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after the marker placement:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;block                  ;; ehpad A (next unwind dest: caller)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2092"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block                      ;; ehpad B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;call @foo&#39;s unwind destination is the ehpad A. But suppose &#39;call @foo&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throws a foreign exception that is not caught by ehpad A, and its next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination should be the caller. But after control flow linearization,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another EH pad can be placed in between (e.g. ehpad B here), making the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// next unwind destination incorrect. In this case, the foreign exception will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead go to ehpad B and will be caught there instead. In this example the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct next unwind destination is the caller, but it can be another outer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch in other cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no specific &#39;call&#39; or &#39;throw&#39; instruction to wrap with an inner</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try&#95;table-end&#95;try&#95;table, so we wrap the whole try&#95;table-end&#95;try&#95;table with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an inner try&#95;table-end&#95;try&#95;table that sends the exception to a trampoline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB. We rethrow the sent exception using a throw&#95;ref to the right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination, which is the caller in the example below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block exnref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 2)  ;; (new) to trampoline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           try&#95;table (catch ... 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         end&#95;block                  ;; ehpad A (next unwind dest: caller)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end&#95;try&#95;table                ;; (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block                        ;; ehpad B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block                          ;; (new) caller trampoline BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throw&#95;ref                          ;; (new) throw to the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a66b0b93d22f984ea3f11e3fc04dbe744">WebAssembly::WasmUseLegacyEH</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adding a try-delegate wrapping an existing try-catch-end can make existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch destination BBs invalid. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Before:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2: (ehpad)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end&#95;try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block   ;; &#39;br bb3&#39; targets here</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suppose this try-catch-end has a catch unwind mismatch, so we need to wrap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this with a try-delegate. Then this becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - After:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br bb3    ;; invalid destination!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     try       ;; (new instruction)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2: (ehpad)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       end&#95;try ;; &#39;br bb3&#39; still incorrectly targets here!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// delegate&#95;bb:  ;; (new BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     delegate  ;; (new instruction)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split&#95;bb:     ;; (new BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now &#39;br bb3&#39; incorrectly branches to an inner scope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As we can see in this case, when branches target a BB that has both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;end&#95;try&#39; and &#39;end&#95;block&#39; and the BB is split to insert a &#39;delegate&#39;, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have to remap existing branch destinations so that they target not the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;end&#95;try&#39; BB but the new &#39;end&#95;block&#39; BB. There can be multiple &#39;delegate&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in between, so we try to find the next BB with &#39;end&#95;block&#39; instruction. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this example, the &#39;br bb3&#39; instruction should be remapped to &#39;br split&#95;bb&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2279"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2280"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isMBB() &amp;&amp; NewEndTryBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(MO.getMBB())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BrDest = MO.getMBB();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2282"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FoundEndBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2285"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : &#42;BrDest) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2286"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == WebAssembly::END&#95;BLOCK) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2287"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  FoundEndBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2332"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In normal assembly languages, when the end of a function is unreachable,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// because the function ends in an infinite loop or a noreturn call or similar,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it isn&#39;t necessary to worry about the function return type at the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the function, because it&#39;s never reached. However, in WebAssembly, blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that end at the function end need to have a return type signature that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// matches the function signature, even though it&#39;s unreachable. This function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// checks for such cases and fixes up the signatures.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WebAssemblyCFGStackify::fixEndsAtEndOfFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MFI = &#42;MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ab7feae1932b436c8630e247166ec42b7">getInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo">WebAssemblyFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.getResults().empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MCInstLower will add the proper types to multivalue signatures based on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function return type</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We added block~end&#95;block and try&#95;table~end&#95;try&#95;table markers in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// placeTryTableMarker. But When catch clause&#39;s destination has a return type,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as in the case of catch with a concrete tag, catch&#95;ref, and catch&#95;all&#95;ref.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block exnref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ... use exnref ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This code is not valid because the block&#39;s body type is not exnref. So we add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an unreachable after the &#39;end&#95;try&#95;table&#39; to make the code valid here:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block exnref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try&#95;table (catch&#95;all&#95;ref 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end&#95;try&#95;table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unreachable      (new)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end&#95;block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because &#39;unreachable&#39; is a terminator we also need to split the BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2426" lineLink="#a19dd673b5e34f3c83c6c17f780836bc7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a19dd673b5e34f3c83c6c17f780836bc7">addUnreachableAfterTryTables</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Insert BLOCK/LOOP/TRY/TRY&#95;TABLE markers at appropriate places.</span></CodeLine>
